review_data.title: All Time Best Italian Food in Zurich
review_data.content: This is the fifth time we've had lunch here..and never disappointed once. Fresh, well- cooked, great taste, and grest price for Zurich. Wish I lived closer.

review_data.title: Just great Italian food - Pastas and more
review_data.content: Food excellent. Fresh. Friendly service. If this restaurant were nearer to home, I would eat there more often. No parking so use the tram. At Lunch packed with students. Take-out of all meals offered.

review_data.title: excellent food
review_data.content: We went there as a group, and got the Gigolo package. The antipasto, 4 different types of pasta, salad, and deserts were all very delicious. And the service was friendly and quick. I would definitely go there again for Italian food.

review_data.title: fair prices, tasty food
review_data.content: Been here twice and I will definitely go back since the prices are extremely fair for Zurich, also they make all their pasta inhouse and the tomato soup is excellent, definitely recommend!

review_data.title: One of the best pasta in zurich
